about:
I’m a self-taught fullstack developer.
I work as a freelancer on projects that aimed to solve real-world problems or to facilitate the work of other people.

modals.title: DENTAL TURNOs xd
modals.description: Web application for managing dental appointments with an integrated calendar, patient file, and interactive odontogram.

modals.title: E-COMMERCE
modals.description: An online store for digital products. It features a database, email delivery, and downloads.

modals.title: FULBOLISTA
modals.description: An interactive website for organizing soccer matches. Players join, chat, choose teams, and view their names.
